desc.en: While organizing their findings, Ui gets an idea from the lemon farm and sprinkles lemon juice on the map, revealing a new location that wasn't visible before.
desc.jp: While organizing their findings, Ui gets an idea from the lemon farm and sprinkles lemon juice on the map, revealing a new location that wasn't visible before.
desc.zh_cn: {cf忧}正在统整目前为止的调查过程，他利用自己在柠檬农场得到的灵感，将柠檬汁洒在地图上。随后，先前没看过的标记在地图上浮现。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

name.en: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.jp: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.zh_cn: 寻找隐藏的遗产～{sn三一}的课外活动～

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.jp: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.zh_cn: 偷偷拷贝{cn修女会}的经典却被发现的{cf忧}，在{cf花子}的仲裁下（？）担负起调查遗址的任务……在{sn三一}近海的无人岛展开横冲直撞的遗迹探险记！

name.en: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.jp: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.zh_cn: 寻找隐藏的遗产～{sn三一}的课外活动～

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.jp: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!

desc.en: The team arrives at a new location where they find a coffin-like box in a cave behind a waterfall. Ui opens it, when suddenly the Mimesises attack!
desc.jp: The team arrives at a new location where they find a coffin-like box in a cave behind a waterfall. Ui opens it, when suddenly the Mimesises attack!
desc.zh_cn: 调查团一行人抵达新的调查点。调查团在瀑布后的洞穴里发现了一个貌似棺材的木箱。就在{cf忧}打开箱子的瞬间，「拷贝」出现了。
